Content:
# scammy-bbp Bug bounty programs that are "scammy" or unethical can sometimes involve promising rewards to researchers for identifying security flaws, but either delay payments, don't pay at all, or misuse the disclosed vulnerabilities. Signs of a Potentially Scammy Bug Bounty Program: - Unclear Terms and Conditions: Programs that don't clearly specify what vulnerabilities qualify for rewards or the amount of the reward. - No Transparent Payment Structure: Lack of details about payment timelines, payout methods, or cases where people report not getting paid. - Little to No Community Feedback: Lack of reputation or negative reviews from the infosec community. `Hits: # of reports of being scammy` | Program Name | Issues Reported | Platform | Source | Hits |---------------------------|-------------------------------------------------------|------------|----------------------| ------ | **[H&M](https://www.hm.com/security.txt)** | No rewards1 |Self hosted| Trusted hacker | 2 | **[Celonis](https://www.celonis.com/pdf/vulnerability-disclosure-program/)** | Ignored reports2 | Self hosted |Trusted hacker | 1 | **[TataPlay](https://www.tataplay.com/bug-bounty-hunter)** | Automated Response, then no response | Self hosted| Trusted Hacker | 1 | **[Synack](https://synack.responsibledisclosure.com/hc/en-us)** | Reward Gatekeepers10|Self hosted | Trusted Hacker | 1 | **[Zeiss](https://www.zeiss.com/disclosure-policy.pdf)**| Ignored reports2 | Self hosted |Trusted hacker| 1 | **[Alefed](https://vdp.alefeducation.com/p/Vulnerability-Disclosure-Policy-and-Submission-Form)**| No impact but fixed3 |Self hosted+YesWeHack|Trusted hacker | 1 | **[Cex.io](https://blog.cex.io/news/cex-io-bug-bounty-program-and-policy-22948)**| Failed to pay4 | Self hosted | Trusted hacker | 1 | **[Roche](https://hackerone.com/roche?type=team)** | Patch & Pass5
Duplicate Disguise7
Duplicate Mirage8
Smokescreen Smackdown12|Self hosted | Trusted Hacker | 2 | **[Zopa](https://zopa.com/.well-known/security.txt)** | Scope Surprise!9 |Self hosted | Trusted hacker | 1 | **[Atos](https://hackerone.com/atos?type=team)**| Bounty Roulette11|Self hosted | Trusted hacker | 1 | **[LuminPDF](https://www.luminpdf.com/bug-bounty-program)** | No impact but fixed3|Self hosted | Trusted hacker | 1 | **[ItsLearning](https://itslearning.com/privacy-commitment/responsible-disclosure)** | Fixed and Ignored Reports2 | Self hosted | Trusted Hacker | 1 | **[Resortdata](https://www.resortdata.com/about/responsible-disclosure/)** | Fixed and Ignored Reports2 | Self hosted | Trusted Hacker | 1 | **[Scalr](https://www.scalr.com/system-description)** | No impact but fixed3 | Self hosted | Trusted Hacker | 1 | **[Standard Bank](http://www.standardbank.co.za/)** | Fixed and Ignored Reports2 | Self hosted | Trusted Hacker | 1 | **[Zynga](https://www.zynga.com/security/rdp)** | Fixed and Ignored Reports2 | Self hosted | Trusted Hacker | 1 | **[Microsoft](https://www.microsoft.com/en-us/msrc/bounty)** | Fixed and Ignored Reports2
| Self hosted | Trusted Hacker | 2 | **[Cimpress](https://cimpress.com/privacy-security/)** | Bounty Roulette11 | Self hosted | Trusted Hacker | 2 | **[Swiggy](https://www.swiggy.com/bug-bounty)** | No rewards1 | Self hosted | Trusted Hacker | 1 ## Hackerone The input for this section are public reports and writeups made by researchers. | Program Name | Report | Problems | Discussion |----------------|---------------|------------|--------------- | **[Hackerone]()**|[2180521](https://hackerone.com/reports/2180521)|CVSS magic| https://github.com/pdelteil/scammy-bbp/discussions/9 |**[Zendesk]()**| [URL](https://gist.github.com/hackermondev/68ec8ed145fcee49d2f5e2b9d2cf2e52)|Sacred Out of Scope| https://github.com/pdelteil/scammy-bbp/discussions/10 ## BugCrowd | Program Name | Issues Reported | Platform | Source | Hits |---------------------------|-------------------------------------------------------|------------|----------------------| ------ | **WesternUnion** | Fixed and Ignored Reports2
Dupe-n-Dump13 | Self hosted | Trusted Hacker | 2 ## Details - 1**No rewards:** They promise rewards for reports in their program, but fail to pay them. Sometimes they just say they stopped paying rewards or they can't do it anymore. - 2**Ignored reports:** They never replied back to researcher. Never > 2 months and counting. - 3**No impact but fixed:** Bug triaged as CVSS 0, no impact or similar but fixed anyways. - 4**Failed to pay:** Agreed to pay a bounty but never accomplished it. Often ignoring follow-up emails. - 5**Patch & Pass:** They fix reported bugs but mark them as Out of scope. - 6**P1 or You're Out:** They won't invite you to their private program unless you report a P1/High bug. - 7**Duplicate Disguise:** They mark reports as duplicated when they are very unlikely to be reported before. - 8**Duplicate Mirage:** They mark all (future) reports as dups without having the full list of domains. - 9**Scope Surprise!:** They define their `in scope` and `out scope` after you send the report, they don't write it down in their program brief. - 10**Reward Gatekeepers:** They will pay a reward only if you have an account in their site (which might very difficult to get). - 11**Bounty Roulette:** Not clear if they pay bounties or not. Often times the include deciving information: calling their page or site 'bug bounty program', having an email address containing bug bounty, etc. - 12**Smokescreen Smackdown:** When a company tries to damage the reputation of a reporter. - 13**Dupe-n-Dump :** They mark all reports of the same type/class as dups.
Translation:
# scammy-bbp “骗局”或不道德的漏洞赏金计划有时会承诺奖励给发现安全漏洞的研究人员，但要么延迟支付，要么根本不支付，或者滥用披露的漏洞。 潜在骗局漏洞赏金计划的迹象： - 条款和条件不明确：计划未明确说明哪些漏洞符合奖励资格或奖励金额。 - 缺乏透明的支付结构：缺少关于支付时间表、支付方式的细节，或有人报告未收到付款的情况。 - 几乎没有社区反馈：缺乏信息安全社区的声誉或存在负面评价。 `命中次数：# 被举报为骗局的数量` | 计划名称 | 报告的问题 | 平台 | 来源 | 命中次数 |---------------------------|-------------------------------------------------------|------------|----------------------| ------ | **[H&M](https://www.hm.com/security.txt)** | 无奖励1 |自托管| 可信黑客 | 2 | **[Celonis](https://www.celonis.com/pdf/vulnerability-disclosure-program/)** | 忽视报告2 | 自托管 |可信黑客 | 1 | **[TataPlay](https://www.tataplay.com/bug-bounty-hunter)** | 自动回复，随后无回应 | 自托管| 可信黑客 | 1 | **[Synack](https://synack.responsibledisclosure.com/hc/en-us)** | 奖励守门人10|自托管 | 可信黑客 | 1 | **[Zeiss](https://www.zeiss.com/disclosure-policy.pdf)**| 忽视报告2 | 自托管 |可信黑客| 1 | **[Alefed](https://vdp.alefeducation.com/p/Vulnerability-Disclosure-Policy-and-Submission-Form)**| 无影响但修复3 |自托管+YesWeHack|可信黑客 | 1 | **[Cex.io](https://blog.cex.io/news/cex-io-bug-bounty-program-and-policy-22948)**| 未支付4 | 自托管 | 可信黑客 | 1 | **[Roche](https://hackerone.com/roche?type=team)** | 修补即过5
伪装重复7
幻影重复8
烟幕反击12|自托管 | 可信黑客 | 2 | **[Zopa](https://zopa.com/.well-known/security.txt)** | 范围惊喜！9 |自托管 | 可信黑客 | 1 | **[Atos](https://hackerone.com/atos?type=team)**| 奖励轮盘11|自托管 | 可信黑客 | 1 | **[LuminPDF](https://www.luminpdf.com/bug-bounty-program)** | 无影响但修复3|自托管 | 可信黑客 | 1 | **[ItsLearning](https://itslearning.com/privacy-commitment/responsible-disclosure)** | 修复且忽视报告2 | 自托管 | 可信黑客 | 1 | **[Resortdata](https://www.resortdata.com/about/responsible-disclosure/)** | 修复且忽视报告2 | 自托管 | 可信黑客 | 1 | **[Scalr](https://www.scalr.com/system-description)** | 无影响但修复3 | 自托管 | 可信黑客 | 1 | **[Standard Bank](http://www.standardbank.co.za/)** | 修复且忽视报告2 | 自托管 | 可信黑客 | 1 | **[Zynga](https://www.zynga.com/security/rdp)** | 修复且忽视报告2 | 自托管 | 可信黑客 | 1 | **[Microsoft](https://www.microsoft.com/en-us/msrc/bounty)** | 修复且忽视报告2
| 自托管 | 可信黑客 | 2 | **[Cimpress](https://cimpress.com/privacy-security/)** | 奖励轮盘11 | 自托管 | 可信黑客 | 2 | **[Swiggy](https://www.swiggy.com/bug-bounty)** | 无奖励1 | 自托管 | 可信黑客 | 1 ## Hackerone 本节输入为研究人员公开的报告和分析。 | 计划名称 | 报告 | 问题 | 讨论 |----------------|---------------|------------|--------------- | **[Hackerone]()**|[2180521](https://hackerone.com/reports/2180521)|CVSS 魔法| https://github.com/pdelteil/scammy-bbp/discussions/9 |**[Zendesk]()**| [链接](https://gist.github.com/hackermondev/68ec8ed145fcee49d2f5e2b9d2cf2e52)|神圣的范围外| https://github.com/pdelteil/scammy-bbp/discussions/10 ## BugCrowd | 计划名称 | 报告的问题 | 平台 | 来源 | 命中次数 |---------------------------|-------------------------------------------------------|------------|----------------------| ------ | **WesternUnion** | 修复且忽视报告2
重复并丢弃13 | 自托管 | 可信黑客 | 2 ## 详情 - 1**无奖励：** 他们承诺在计划中对报告给予奖励，但未支付。有时他们直接说停止支付奖励或无法支付。 - 2**忽视报告：** 从未回复研究人员。时间超过2个月且持续中。 - 3**无影响但修复：** 漏洞被评为CVSS 0，无影响或类似情况，但仍然修复。 - 4**未支付：** 同意支付赏金但从未兑现。经常忽略后续邮件。 - 5**修补即过：** 他们修复报告的漏洞，但标记为范围外。 - 6**必须P1否则不邀：** 除非报告P1/高危漏洞，否则不邀请加入私有计划。 - 7**伪装重复：** 当报告极不可能之前被报告时，他们标记为重复。 - 8**幻影重复：** 在没有完整域名列表的情况下，将所有（未来）报告标记为重复。 - 9**范围惊喜！：** 他们在你提交报告后定义“范围内”和“范围外”，并未在计划简介中写明。 - 10**奖励守门人：** 只有你拥有其网站账户（可能非常难获得）时才支付奖励。 - 11**奖励轮盘：** 不确定是否支付赏金。经常包含欺骗信息：称其页面或网站为“漏洞赏金计划”，邮件地址包含漏洞赏金等。 - 12**烟幕反击：** 当公司试图破坏报告者声誉时。 - 13**重复并丢弃：** 他们将所有相同类型/类别的报告标记为重复。

RowTranslations.originContent: # scammy-bbp
RowTranslations.translatedContent: <translate-content># scammy-bbp

RowTranslations.originContent: Bug bounty programs that are "scammy" or unethical can sometimes involve promising rewards to researchers for identifying security flaws, but either delay payments, don't pay at all, or misuse the disclosed vulnerabilities.
RowTranslations.translatedContent: “骗局”或不道德的漏洞赏金计划有时会承诺奖励给发现安全漏洞的研究人员，但要么延迟支付，要么根本不支付，或者滥用披露的漏洞。
潜在骗局漏洞赏金计划的迹象：

RowTranslations.originContent: Signs of a Potentially Scammy Bug Bounty Program:

RowTranslations.translatedContent: - 条款和条件不明确：计划未明确说明哪些漏洞符合奖励资格或奖励金额。

RowTranslations.originContent: - Unclear Terms and Conditions: Programs that don't clearly specify what vulnerabilities qualify for rewards or the amount of the reward.
RowTranslations.translatedContent: - 缺乏透明的支付结构：缺少关于支付时间表、支付方式的细节，或有人报告未收到付款的情况。

RowTranslations.originContent: - No Transparent Payment Structure: Lack of details about payment timelines, payout methods, or cases where people report not getting paid.
RowTranslations.translatedContent: - 几乎没有社区反馈：缺乏信息安全社区的声誉或存在负面评价。

RowTranslations.originContent: - Little to No Community Feedback: Lack of reputation or negative reviews from the infosec community.

RowTranslations.translatedContent: ## 详情

RowTranslations.originContent: ## Details

RowTranslations.translatedContent: - <sup>1</sup>**无奖励：** 他们承诺在计划中对报告给予奖励，但未支付。有时他们直接说停止支付奖励或无法支付。

RowTranslations.originContent: - <sup>1</sup>**No rewards:** They promise rewards for reports in their program, but fail to pay them. Sometimes they just say they stopped paying rewards or they can't do it anymore.
RowTranslations.translatedContent: - <sup>2</sup>**忽视报告：** 从未回复研究人员。时间超过2个月且持续中。

RowTranslations.originContent: - <sup>2</sup>**Ignored reports:** They never replied back to researcher. Never > 2 months and counting.
RowTranslations.translatedContent: - <sup>3</sup>**无影响但修复：** 漏洞被评为CVSS 0，无影响或类似情况，但仍然修复。

RowTranslations.originContent: - <sup>3</sup>**No impact but fixed:** Bug triaged as CVSS 0, no impact or similar but fixed anyways.
RowTranslations.translatedContent: - <sup>4</sup>**未支付：** 同意支付赏金但从未兑现。经常忽略后续邮件。

RowTranslations.originContent: - <sup>4</sup>**Failed to pay:** Agreed to pay a bounty but never accomplished it. Often ignoring follow-up emails.
RowTranslations.translatedContent: - <sup>5</sup>**修补即过：** 他们修复报告的漏洞，但标记为范围外。

RowTranslations.originContent: - <sup>5</sup>**Patch & Pass:** They fix reported bugs but mark them as Out of scope.
RowTranslations.translatedContent: - <sup>6</sup>**必须P1否则不邀：** 除非报告P1/高危漏洞，否则不邀请加入私有计划。

RowTranslations.originContent: - <sup>6</sup>**P1 or You're Out:** They won't invite you to their private program unless you report a P1/High bug.
RowTranslations.translatedContent: - <sup>7</sup>**伪装重复：** 当报告极不可能之前被报告时，他们标记为重复。

RowTranslations.originContent: - <sup>7</sup>**Duplicate Disguise:** They mark reports as duplicated when they are very unlikely to be reported before.
RowTranslations.translatedContent: - <sup>8</sup>**幻影重复：** 在没有完整域名列表的情况下，将所有（未来）报告标记为重复。

RowTranslations.originContent: - <sup>8</sup>**Duplicate Mirage:** They mark all (future) reports as dups without having the full list of domains.
RowTranslations.translatedContent: - <sup>9</sup>**范围惊喜！：** 他们在你提交报告后定义“范围内”和“范围外”，并未在计划简介中写明。

RowTranslations.originContent: - <sup>9</sup>**Scope Surprise!:** They define their `in scope` and `out scope` after you send the report, they don't write it down in their program brief.
RowTranslations.translatedContent: - <sup>10</sup>**奖励守门人：** 只有你拥有其网站账户（可能非常难获得）时才支付奖励。

RowTranslations.originContent: - <sup>10</sup>**Reward Gatekeepers:** They will pay a reward only if you have an account in their site (which might very difficult to get).
RowTranslations.translatedContent: - <sup>11</sup>**奖励轮盘：** 不确定是否支付赏金。经常包含欺骗信息：称其页面或网站为“漏洞赏金计划”，邮件地址包含漏洞赏金等。

RowTranslations.originContent: - <sup>11</sup>**Bounty Roulette:** Not clear if they pay bounties or not. Often times the include deciving information: calling their page or site 'bug bounty program', having an email address containing bug bounty, etc.
RowTranslations.translatedContent: - <sup>12</sup>**烟幕反击：** 当公司试图破坏报告者声誉时。

RowTranslations.originContent: - <sup>12</sup>**Smokescreen Smackdown:** When a company tries to damage the reputation of a reporter.
RowTranslations.translatedContent: - <sup>13</sup>**重复并丢弃：** 他们将所有相同类型/类别的报告标记为重复。

RowTranslations.originContent: - <sup>13</sup>**Dupe-n-Dump :** They mark all reports of the same type/class as dups.
